description: cmd/godoc: provide a link from notes to source location

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
LGTM except - do we really want to expose TODOs inside functions? i don't see the point of making public debate about internal implementation details.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f9cb5530d0d8 ***

cmd/godoc: provide a link from notes to source location

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8122043

subject: code review 8122043: cmd/godoc: provide a link from notes to source location
